thread.title: Hidden camera Paranormal Activity prank scares the pants off prospective home buyers - Fun
thread.title_full: Hidden camera Paranormal Activity prank scares the pants off prospective home buyers - Fun News - Digital Spy

author: Harry Fletcher
title: Hidden camera Paranormal Activity prank scares the pants off prospective home buyers - Fun
text: When a house goes up for sale, it's not normal practice for the seller to try and scare the pants off prospective buyersâ€¦But that's what happened as part of a brilliant Paranormal Activity prank, which saw a host of potential buyers scared witless as they viewed an open house.Unbeknown to them, the house was in fact the very same one that was used to film the first Paranormal Activity movie, and they were all in for a nasty shock.The poor souls knew something was up when they were subjected to a swinging chandelier, a sparking microwave and a falling painting, but nothing could have prepared them for what took place upstairs.While viewing the bathroom, the mirror suddenly cracked and all hell broke loose in the bedroom.The clip has been released ahead of Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension, and if that doesn't get you in the mood for the film, nothing will.Producer Jason Blum previously announced that The Ghost Dimension will be the last in the Paranormal Activity series.Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension is released in UK cinemas on October 21, and in the US on October 23.
